memberdef.name: import_balance

detaileddescription.para: Get the required public keys to sign the transaction which had been owned by us
NOTE, if erase_existing_sigs set to true, the original trasaction's signatures will be erased

parameterdescription.para: The transaction could have been partially signed already, if set to false, the corresponding public key of existing signatures won't be returned. If set to true, the existing signatures will be erased and all required keys returned.
